title: Kronos Executor configuration file format
description: The Kronos-Executor configuration file format controls the execution of the Executor

coordinator_binary.description: Path to the synthetic apps executable (kronos-coordinator)

execution_context.description: Execution context to use for the jobs

procs_per_node.description: Number of processors per node. N_requested_nodes = Ncpu_synth_app / [procs_per_node]

read_cache.description: Folder containing files to be read by the synthetic apps. (files are automatically generated)

read_file_multiplicity.description: Files generated by Kronos for each file size

read_file_size_min.description: Minimum read size (to be interpreted as 2^<read_file_size_min>)

read_file_size_max.description: Maximum read size (to be interpreted as 2^<read_file_size_min>)

file_read_multiplicity.description: Number of files (for each file size) used to randomize the read calls of the synthetic apps

event_batch_size.description: Number of events processed by the executor at once (to be set only if execution_mode: events)
